articles.content: The awe-inspiring Nothing Ear Stick earbuds’ charging case design has been revealed at the London Fashion Week. Nothing is sparing no effort to create hype around its upcoming earbuds. In line with t… [+2241 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 series could include this more accurate facial recognition system - PhoneArena
articles.description: Samsung has filed a patent application with the appropriate Korean agency for a facial recognition system that uses two under-display cameras.
